channel.title: flow control on Notes
channel.description: Recent content in flow control on Notes

item.title: CS138-lecture-20210406
item.description: TCP Cont. # Flow control # rwnd = receive window Connection management # TCP 3-way handshake steps: SYN = 1, ACK = 0: SYN packet SYN = 1, ACK = 1: SYNACK packet SYN = 0, ACK = 1: ACK packet. This packet can contain real data from client to server. Principles of congestion control # In a perfect world: \( \lambda_{\text{in} } = \lambda_{\text{out} } \) , however this is not usually the case.
